content: In Black Myth Wukong’s second chapter, you’ll leave behind the forests of Black Wind Mountain for the dry sands of the Yellow Wind Ridge. An energetic (yet headless) man ing a Chinese lute (known as a sanxian) will set the stage for this realm, and helpfully revive our Destined One from becoming a pincushion full of arrows.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
In Black Myth Wukong’s second chapter, you’ll leave behind the forests of Black Wind Mountain for the dry sands of the Yellow Wind Ridge. An energetic (yet headless) man ing a Chinese lute (known as a sanxian) will set the stage for this realm, and helpfully revive our Destined One from becoming a pincushion full of arrows.
